text-custom-field-form.Name: Certificate Info
text-custom-field-form.Description:
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const addressTextarea = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.form-group')).find(group => group.querySelector('label')?.textContent.trim() === 'Address')?.querySelector('textarea'); 
    if (addressTextarea) addressTextarea.setAttribute('readonly', 'true');
    const customFieldsGroup = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('fieldset')).find(fieldset => fieldset.querySelector('legend')?.textContent.trim() === 'Custom Fields'); 
    if (customFieldsGroup) ['Business Reference', 'FiscalDay Summary', 'Certificate Info', 'EGS Version'].forEach(label => Array.from(customFieldsGroup.querySelectorAll('.form-group')).find(group => group.querySelector('label')?.textContent.trim() === label)?.querySelector('textarea, input')?.setAttribute('readonly', 'true'));
});
</script>

text-custom-field-form.Name: Payment Type 1

1 | Card
2 | MobileWallet
3 | Coupon
4 | Credit
5 | BankTransfer
6 | Other
